Title: One Night in Yerevan
Writer: Gina Welch, David Hollander, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Mickey faces the consequences of giving in to Muncie while Bridget ends up getting into a fight at school, causing Abby to question her behaviour.
